lead_paragraph: A rain-loosened slab of hillside collapsed on three houses and an upscale lodge, killing at least 19 people, the authorities said.
snippet: A rain-loosened slab of hillside collapsed on three houses and an upscale lodge, killing at least 19 people, the authorities said.

headline.main: Brazil: Deadly Mudslide at Resort Near Rio
headline.print_headline: Brazil: Deadly Mudslide at Resort Near Rio
